attributes.action: Aske Barclays to give Profits to Charity
attributes.additional_details:
Barclays Bank posted Billions of pounds of Profits this week.
Dave Fishwick, founder of "Bank of Dave' (Burnley Savings and Loans) gives all his banks profits to Charity. After seeing this example and after bank scandal after banking scandal.

Can the David Cameron and George Osbourne ask Barclays to make a gesture and donate a large portion of this profit to Charity.
